South Disald, 
My dear wakia

recently received a song

for five hundred dolare se

credited to you as

The receipt of the money

aestate ad

* tatement of expenses to date returned in the recator

i a Sately,

the amount in question does not sure

an over

de

since you know a mumber of beste bat soon yun 
or gued to send you check for fre

e 
will contenir jou nad st

er szeleteport your wound yeezmus study 
te youre tty am delighted to get sucked ne apa chat 
this means that you will able to resume your work bere in and out 
falk with orory poopprest of success 
very bent vishes to you, always be tave me

Sineerely your

inespai
raw: South Disald, My dear wakia recently received a song for five hundred dolare se credited to you as The receipt of the money aestate ad * tatement of expenses to date returned in the recator i a Sately, the amount in question does not sure an over de since you know a mumber of beste bat soon yun or gued to send you check for fre e will contenir jou nad st er szeleteport your wound yeezmus study te youre tty am delighted to get sucked ne apa chat this means that you will able to resume your work bere in and out falk with orory poopprest of success very bent vishes to you, always be tave me Sineerely your inespai

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of the check for $500 and stating that a statement has been sent out. While the account is depleted, Stearns will send the $5 requested. Stearns hopes that Luk will return in the fall with every prospect of success.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
